review_title: Not at all what they said it would be
pros: Insurance, benefits and the lastest you leave it between 7-8 pm.
cons: You only get one raise a year and that's maximum 2%. High turnover rate so you're always running on a short crew. If management has an issue with you they'll do anything to get you to quit. The management technique is to not inform folks of change and punish. They lure cooks in with unrealistic promises and never follow through. The longer folks stay the more they get treated like garbage. Management is always puttibg more work on you and expecting you to be okay with it.

review_title: I enjoyed this work experience but various issues are causing me to look for work elsewhere
job_title: Personal Care Assistant in Kalamazoo, MI
pros: working in geriatrics is very fulfilling spiritually, the company strives to use the Best Friend approach to care, the company is consistently working on projects to improve the campus,
cons: The job tasks are more difficult than they are supposed to be in an assisted living facility. The Best Friend approach is not very well enforced. As a full-time student it was very difficult to adjust the work schedule every semester to work with a changing class schedule. I lost hours every semester regardless of having the availability to work a variety of shifts.

pros: Family like work place, promote professional growth, care about employees, treats staff good. I believe in the vision of the company and the CEO and executive staff. I feel very strong about its future potential.
cons: Not enough pay, benefits are not very affordable for me, and more advancement opportunities would be nice.

review_title: Best job I have ever had
pros: I felt the Heritage Not-For-Profit difference the minute I walked in the door for my interview almost 7 years ago.  The company truly cares for all the residents and employees.
cons: No company is perfect, we have some difficult staff and sometimes not enough staff, but compared to other places I have worked this place is hands down the best.

pros: Everyone is helpful and friendly.  Management truly cares about happy employees, and there is effort to help employees succeed.
cons: I can't think of any.
